wrs.js File Reference

Detailed Description

This file contains the methods for remote scripting.

'Remote Scripting' is the technique that machine A remotely fetches and uses script files on machine B. This module empowers the Wednus platform to be able to load extension packs remotely.

Note:
supports IE5+
See also:
http://ajaxpatterns.org/On-Demand_Javascript

http://developer.yahoo.com/javascript/howto-proxy.html

http://ajaxpatterns.org/On-Demand_Javascript

http://ajaxpatterns.org/IFrame_Call

http://www.theurer.cc/blog/2005/12/15/web-services-json-dump-your-proxy/

Author:
Sundew H. Shin
